fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Make somebody sleepy, roleblocking them the following night. They will be vulnerable that night.
-Wake somebody up, allowing them to act twice that night.
-Put somebody into a deep sleep, making it so they cannot speak or do actions, or vote. They will wake up in three nights, or if two people visit them(Night Ability)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-All abilities of this role are day ability's, unless specified otherwise, since they're sleepy during night.
-You cannot be roleblocked or redirected, since you're asleep anyways.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See that the original good faction loses the game(you may achieve this goal when dead, so long as the host deemed you did something "useful")
